text: "Destiny" is a song co-written and performed by American recording artist Jim Brickman, featuring singer Jordan Hill and Billy Porter. It was released in 1999 on Windham Hill Records and BMG as the second single and as well as the thirteenth track from his fifth studio album of the same name. It is a pop song that was written by Dane Deviller, Sean Hosein and Jim Brickman and produced by the latter and by David Pringle. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (1999) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== * * * * * Category:1999 singles Category:1999 songs Category:Jim Brickman songs Category:Bertelsmann Music Group singles Category:Songs written by Jim Brickman Category:Songs written by Sean Hosein Category:Songs written by Dane Deviller Category:Pop ballads
title: Destiny (Jim Brickman song)
